_header: O fair madame Christ would ye knew my pain
Subjects: roundels; lovers, addresses to beloved; love lyrics

BLHar682.First Lines:
O Fayre madame crist wold ye knew my payneWith all my thought and
                    bisy remembraunce…
BLHar682.Last Lines:
…For loue of yow and thorugh yowre hard suffraunceNo reward
                    founde for ought þat y complayne
BLHar682.Note: As written, repeats first words of lines 1-3 at end to indicate going back to first five lines of the roundel.
